function.description:
Connect to a database. Returns a connection object.
The database string should be in these formats:
MySQL: "host:port/database" Oracle SID: "host:port:SID" Oracle Service: "host:port/service" MSSQL: "host:port/database" SQLite: "file" SQLite In-Memory: ":memory:"
Valid database types are: "mysql", "mssql", "oracle" and "sqlite". The user and pass parameter are for the username and password of the user. The options parameter takes an object with database specific options. See the examples.
The user, pass and options parameters are optional.

example.header: Connect to a SQLite database and select from the "test" table
Connect to the MySQL database "testdb" with user "user" and password "pass" and allow multi-queries
